languages.text: "И ты поверил{mf||а}, что от него можно столь просто избавиться? Воистину мон-кай заурядны умом и лишены проницательности". {n}Эльдар раздраженно ведет плечом.{/n} "Это было лишь одно из множества тел Тервантьяса — тел, что он способен вырастить из клочка своей плоти".

traits.locale_text: "И ты поверил{mf||а}, что от скульптора плоти можно столь просто избавиться? Воистину мон-кай заурядны умом и лишены проницательности".

languages.text: "And you believed you could dispose of him so easily? The minds of mon-keigh are dull and undiscerning indeed." {n}The Aeldari throws up his hands in irritation.{/n} "That was only one of Tervantias's many bodies — bodies which he is capable of growing from a scrap of his own flesh."
languages.original_text: "И ты поверил{mf||а}, что от него можно столь просто избавиться? Воистину мон-кай заурядны умом и лишены проницательности". {n}Эльдар раздраженно ведет плечом.{/n} "Это было лишь одно из множества тел Тервантьяса — тел, что он способен вырастить из клочка своей плоти".

traits.locale_text: "And you believed you could dispose of him so easily? The minds of mon-keigh are dull and undiscerning indeed." {n}The Aeldari throws up his hands in irritation.{/n} "That was only one of Tervantias's many bodies — bodies which he is capable of growing from a scrap of his own flesh."
"And you believed a flesh sculptor was so easy to get rid of? The minds of mon-keigh are dull and undiscerning indeed."

"And you believed you could dispose of him so easily? The minds of mon-keigh are dull and undiscerning indeed." {n}The Aeldari throws up his hands in irritation.{/n} "That was only one of Tervantias's many bodies — bodies which he is capable of growing from a scrap of his own flesh."
"And you believed a flesh sculptor was so easy to get rid of? The minds of mon-keigh are dull and undiscerning indeed."
"And you believed a flesh sculptor was so easily disposed of? The minds of mon-keigh are dull and undiscerning indeed."
"And you believed a flesh sculptor was so easily disposed of? The minds of mon-keigh are dull and undiscerning indeed."

"And you believed you could dispose of him so easily? The minds of mon-keigh are dull and undiscerning indeed." {n}The Aeldari throws up his hands in irritation.{/n} "That was only one of Tervantias's many bodies — bodies which he is capable of growing from a scrap of his own flesh."

"And you believed you could dispose of him so easily? The minds of mon-keigh are dull and undiscerning indeed." {n}The Aeldari throws up his hands in irritation.{/n} "That was only one of Tervantias's many bodies — bodies which he is capable of growing from a scrap of his own flesh."

"And you believed you could dispose of him so easily? The minds of mon-keigh are dull and undiscerning indeed." {n}The Aeldari throws up his hands in irritation.{/n} "That was only one of Tervantias's many bodies — bodies which he is capable of growing from a scrap of his own flesh."

languages.text: «¿Acaso creías que podrías deshacerte de él tan fácilmente? Desde luego, las mentes de los mon-keigh están vacías y atrofiadas». {n}El Aeldari, frustrado, levanta las manos.{/n} «Ese solo era uno de los muchos cuerpos de Tervantias, que puede cultivarlos a partir de una tira de su propia carne».
languages.original_text: "And you believed you could dispose of him so easily? The minds of mon-keigh are dull and undiscerning indeed." {n}The Aeldari throws up his hands in irritation.{/n} "That was only one of Tervantias's many bodies — bodies which he is capable of growing from a scrap of his own flesh."

traits.locale_text: «¿Acaso creías que podrías deshacerte de él tan fácilmente? Desde luego, las mentes de los mon-keigh están vacías y atrofiadas». {n}El Aeldari, frustrado, levanta las manos.{/n} «Ese solo era uno de los muchos cuerpos de Tervantias, que puede cultivarlos a partir de una tira de su propia carne».

languages.text: “你以为他这么简单就能解决掉吗？猴子的头脑实在是太简单了，缺乏洞察力。”{n}眼前的艾达灵族恼怒地举起了双手。{/n}“那不过是特万提亚斯众多身躯中的其中一具。他只要挖下身上的一小块肉，就能复制出许多备用身躯。”
languages.original_text: "And you believed you could dispose of him so easily? The minds of mon-keigh are dull and undiscerning indeed." {n}The Aeldari throws up his hands in irritation.{/n} "That was only one of Tervantias's many bodies — bodies which he is capable of growing from a scrap of his own flesh."

traits.locale_text: “你以为这么简单就能杀死血肉雕刻者吗？猴子的头脑果然愚钝又无知。”

languages.text: « Vous pensiez vraiment vous débarrasser de lui aussi facilement ? Comme toujours, l'esprit des mon-keigh manque cruellement de discernement. » {n}L'Aeldari lève les mains d'un air contrarié.{/n} « Ce n'était guère que l'un des nombreux corps de Tervantias... des corps qu'il est capable de faire pousser à partir de lambeaux de sa propre chair. »
languages.original_text: "And you believed you could dispose of him so easily? The minds of mon-keigh are dull and undiscerning indeed." {n}The Aeldari throws up his hands in irritation.{/n} "That was only one of Tervantias's many bodies — bodies which he is capable of growing from a scrap of his own flesh."

traits.locale_text: « Pensiez-vous vraiment qu'il était si facile de se débarrasser d'un sculpteur de chair ? Comme toujours, l'esprit des mon-keigh manque cruellement de discernement. »

languages.text: 「彼をそう簡単に消せると思っていたのか？モン＝ケイの頭は実に鈍く、見識に欠けるな」{n}アエルダリは苛立ちから両手を上げる。{/n}「あれはテルヴァンティアスの数ある肉体の一つにすぎない。肉片から生み出し、育て上げることができる」
languages.original_text: "And you believed you could dispose of him so easily? The minds of mon-keigh are dull and undiscerning indeed." {n}The Aeldari throws up his hands in irritation.{/n} "That was only one of Tervantias's many bodies — bodies which he is capable of growing from a scrap of his own flesh."

traits.locale_text: 「彼をそう簡単に消せると思っていたのか？モン＝ケイの頭は実に鈍く、見識に欠けるな」{n}アエルダリは苛立ちから両手を上げる。{/n}「あれはテルヴァンティアスの数ある肉体の一つにすぎない。肉片から生み出し、育て上げることができる」

languages.text: "Und Ihr dachtet, Ihr würdet ihn so einfach loswerden? Der Verstand der Chem-Pan-Sey ist wirklich öde und einfältig." {n}Der Aeldari gestikuliert wütend mit den Händen.{/n} "Das war nur eine von Tervantias' vielen Leichen ... Leichen, die er aus einem Stück seines Fleisches züchten kann."
languages.original_text: "And you believed you could dispose of him so easily? The minds of mon-keigh are dull and undiscerning indeed." {n}The Aeldari throws up his hands in irritation.{/n} "That was only one of Tervantias's many bodies — bodies which he is capable of growing from a scrap of his own flesh."

traits.locale_text: "Und Ihr dachtet, ein Fleischbildhauer wäre so leicht loszuwerden? Der Verstand der Chem-Pan-Sey ist wirklich öde und einfältig."

languages.text: "Ondan bu kadar kolay kurtulabileceğine mi inandın? Mon-keigh zihinleri gerçekten de körelmiş ve anlayıştan uzak." {n}Aeldari, rahatsız olmuşça ellerini havaya kaldırıyor.{/n} "Bu, Tervantias'ın pek çok bedeninden yalnızca biriydi. Kendi etinin parçasından büyütebildiği bedenlerinden."
languages.original_text: "And you believed you could dispose of him so easily? The minds of mon-keigh are dull and undiscerning indeed." {n}The Aeldari throws up his hands in irritation.{/n} "That was only one of Tervantias's many bodies — bodies which he is capable of growing from a scrap of his own flesh."

traits.locale_text: "Ondan bu kadar kolay kurtulabileceğine mi inandın? Mon-keigh zihinleri gerçekten de körelmiş ve anlayıştan uzak." {n}Aeldari, rahatsız olmuşça ellerini havaya kaldırıyor.{/n} "Bu, Tervantias'ın pek çok bedeninden yalnızca biriydi. Kendi etinin parçasından büyütebildiği bedenlerinden."
